trans-unit.source: Enables serialization of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for serialisering av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Serializer%2A> property of the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er utsatt <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Serializer%2A>for root- <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Serializer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Serialization saves the state of the chart and also provides the option to load the serialized data into the chart.
trans-unit.target: Gir deg muligheten til å laste inn de serialiserte dataene i diagrammet også serialisering lagres tilstanden for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: All chart properties can be persisted, including the chart's data.
trans-unit.target: Alle egenskaper for diagram kan beholdes, inkludert data for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: In addition, all chart properties marked for serialization can be reset.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan alle egenskaper som er merket for serialisering nullstilles.

trans-unit.source: This class can optionally be used when managing user-defined view state.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan eventuelt brukes ved behandling av en brukerdefinert visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: One of its `Load` methods can be used to load the view state, and one of the `Save` methods can be used when setting the view state.
trans-unit.target: Ett av de `Load` metoder kan brukes til å laste inn visningsstatusen, og ett av de `Save` kan brukes når du angir visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The XML or binary formats can be used to store serialized data.
trans-unit.target: XML- eller binære formatene kan brukes til å serialisere dataene.

trans-unit.source: XML is used by default, but you can change the format with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: XML brukes som standard, men du kan endre formatet med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: Chart properties are saved and loaded using the `Save` and `Load` methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for diagram lagres og lastes inn ved hjelp av `Save` og `Load` metoder, henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: Note that only properties with non-default values will be saved.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at bare egenskaper med ikke-standard verdier skal lagres.

trans-unit.source: Data can be saved and/or loaded using a file, stream, <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, <xref:System.IO.TextReader>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects.
trans-unit.target: Data kan lagres og/eller lastet inn ved hjelp av en fil, flyten, <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, <xref:System.IO.TextReader>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>og <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objekter.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.IO.TextReader> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: When saving and/or loading data using an object derived from the <xref:System.IO.TextReader>, <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> classes, the format of the data must be XML.
trans-unit.target: Når lagring og/eller innlasting av data ved hjelp av et objekt som er avledet fra den <xref:System.IO.TextReader>, <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>eller <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>klasser, formatet på dataene må være XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter> </xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: The following list describes three techniques, from basic to advanced, used to define serializable data.
trans-unit.target: Listen nedenfor beskriver tre teknikker, fra grunnleggende til Avansert, brukes til å definere serialiserbare.

trans-unit.source: Note that it is also possible to define non-serializable data.
trans-unit.target: Merk at det er også mulig å definere ikke-serialiserbare data.

trans-unit.source: This technique is described in the next paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Dette er beskrevet i neste avsnitt.

trans-unit.source: - Serialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> using the `Save` and `Load` methods, without specifying any serializable properties.
trans-unit.target: -Serialisere den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>ved hjelp av den `Save` og `Load` metoder, uten å angi serialiserbare egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: All chart properties with non-default values, which includes chart data, will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Alle egenskaper for diagram med ikke-standard verdier, som inkluderer diagramdata, skal serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: - Serialize the chart properties specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Serialisere egenskaper for diagram som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> property groups the chart properties to be serialized into categories such as Data, Appearance, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>egenskapen grupper egenskapene diagrammet serialiseres i kategorier, for eksempel Data, utseende og så videre.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the names of <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects are automatically serialized; the serialized data is then applied to existing chart areas and series when loaded.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at navnene på <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objekter automatisk er serialisert; de serialiserte dataene brukes deretter eksisterende diagramområder og series som lastes inn.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> property is implemented internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> property - Serialization of chart properties specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>egenskapen implementeres internt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontrollere som den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>egenskapen - serialisering av egenskaper for diagram som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is a comma-separated listing of all chart properties that are serializable.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en kommadelt liste over alle egenskaper for diagram som kan serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: After this property is set to an explicit value, it is the responsibility of the developer to specify all properties to be saved.
trans-unit.target: Etter at denne egenskapen er satt til en eksplisitt verdi, er ansvarlig for utviklere å angi alle egenskapene som skal lagres.

trans-unit.source: In other words, unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> property, the names of chart areas and series will not be automatically persisted.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, i motsetning til det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>egenskapen, navnene på diagramområder og serien blir ikke automatisk beholdt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> properties can also be used in conjunction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper kan også brukes sammen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, make sure that <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> is concatenated with itself when being set, otherwise the chart properties specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> property will be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Må du kontrollere at <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>er slått sammen med seg selv når angis, ellers egenskaper for diagram som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>egenskapen overstyres.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prohibit certain properties from being serialized, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å hindre at enkelte egenskaper som serialiseres, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: When one property is set as serializable and non-serializable, which is common when wildcards are used, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> property has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Når én egenskap er angitt som kan serialiseres og ikke-serialiserbare, som er felles ved bruk av jokertegn, den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, precedence also depends on how many wildcards were used when a property was specified.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid avhengig prioriteten også av hvor mange jokertegn ble brukes når en egenskap ble angitt.

trans-unit.source: By default, serializable properties are reset to their defaults before they are loaded.
trans-unit.target: Som standard blir serialiserbare egenskaper tilbakestilles til standardverdiene før de er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette problemet kan endres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Reset%2A> method can also be used to explicitly reset chart properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Reset%2A>metoden kan også brukes til å tilbakestille eksplisitt egenskaper for diagram til standardverdiene.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of chart content to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir diagrammet innholdstypen serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: By default, all chart properties will be serialized when any of the `Save` and `Load` methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Som standard, blir alle egenskaper for diagram serialiseres når noen av de `Save` og `Load` kalles metoder.

trans-unit.source: To provide more control over what is serialized, use the Content property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk innholdsegenskapen for å gi bedre kontroll over hva serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties can also be used along with the Content property.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper kan også brukes sammen med innholdsegenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Important** The Content property determines types of chart characteristics, such as "appearance", to be serialized, and is actually implemented internally as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **Viktig** for innholdsegenskapen bestemmer typer diagrammet egenskaper, for eksempel "utseende" serialiseres, og implementeres faktisk internt som den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that setting the Content property and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> property will result in the Content property value being overridden, unless <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> is concatenated.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at angivelse av innholdsegenskapen og deretter innstilling av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>egenskapen, fører verdien innholdsegenskapen overstyres, med mindre <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>er slått sammen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the sample code below for an example of this procedure.
trans-unit.target: Se eksempelkode under et eksempel på denne prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: If you set the Content property, all <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects names will automatically be serialized; this means that serialized data that pertains to chart areas and series will be applied to existing objects when loaded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter egenskapen innhold alle <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objektnavn vil automatisk serialiseres; Dette betyr at serialiserte dataene som gjelder diagramområder og serien brukes på eksisterende objekter når lastet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property affects all load, save and reset operations.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen påvirker alle laste inn, lagre og tilbakestille operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationContents"></xref> enumeration value that represents the chart content that will be serialized during a load, save or reset operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationContents"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer diagrammet innholdet som skal serialiseres under for å laste inn, lagre eller tilbakestille operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: By default, all non-default chart properties, including data, are persisted.
trans-unit.target: Som standard faste egenskaper for alle ikke-standard diagram, inkludert data.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format used when the chart is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir formatet som brukes når diagrammet serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: Data can be serialized in either an XML or binary format.
trans-unit.target: Kan serialiseres data i en XML- eller binært format.

trans-unit.source: Binary format is compact, and takes less storage than XML.
trans-unit.target: Binært format er kompakt og bruker mindre lagringsplass enn XML.

trans-unit.source: XML, however, is a text format that is human-readable.
trans-unit.target: XML, er imidlertid et tekstformat er lesbar.

trans-unit.source: When you save or load serialized data, the format must be XML.
trans-unit.target: Når du lagrer eller laste inn serialiserte dataene, må formatet være XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationFormat"></xref> enumeration value that represents the format of the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationFormat"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer formatet for de serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: The default value is XML.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er XML.

trans-unit.source: Returns a serializable or non serializable class and/or property names, depending on the specific flag value.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en serialiserbar eller ikke-serialiserbare klasse-og/eller egenskapsnavn, alt etter flaggverdien spesifikke.

trans-unit.source: The serializable content.
trans-unit.target: Serialiserbare innholdet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True " name="True " href=""></xref>to get a serializable string; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to get a non serializaable string.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True " name="True " href=""></xref>å hente en serialiserbar streng; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å hente en streng som ikke serializaable.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the serializable or non serializable class and/or property names.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer serialiserbare eller ikke-serialiserbare klassen og/eller egenskapen navn.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether object properties are reset to default values before loading.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om objektegenskaper skal tilbakestilles til standardverdiene før innlasting.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if object properties are reset to default values before loading; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>om objektegenskaper skal tilbakestilles til standardverdiene før innlasting; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the chart serializer is working in template-creation mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om diagramserialisereren fungerer i opprettingsmodus for malen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the chart serializer is working in template-creation mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Hvis diagramserialisereren fungerer i modus for oppretting av mal. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether unknown XML properties and elements will be ignored without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om ukjent egenskaper for XML- og -elementer ignoreres uten at det oppstår et unntak.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if unknown XML properties and elements are ignored without throwing an exception; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>om ukjent XML-egenskaper og elementer ignoreres uten at det oppstår et unntak; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads serialized data into the control from an object derived from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class.
trans-unit.target: Laster serialisert data i kontrollen fra et objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.Stream>klassen.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Call this method to load serialized data into the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden for å laste inn serialiserte dataene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: When a load operation occurs, serializable properties are, by default, first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved.
trans-unit.target: Når det oppstår en innlastingen, serialiserbare egenskaper, som standard først tilbakestilles til standardverdiene før de er satt til de faste verdiene, hvis lagret.

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre dette problemet ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Som standard alle serialiserte diagrammet egenskaper blir lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: To load specific serialized properties, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> , <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties before loading the data.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn bestemte serialiserte egenskaper, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper før du laster inn dataene.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that when data is saved using a `Save` method, only those properties that have non-default values are actually serialized.
trans-unit.target: Merk at når dataene er lagret som bruker en `Save` metode, bare egenskaper som har ikke standard verdier er faktisk serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: An object derived from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class, for example, a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> object.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er avledet fra den <xref:System.IO.Stream>class, for eksempel en <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Loads serialized data into the control from a reader object that derives from the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class.
trans-unit.target: Laster serialisert data i kontrollen fra en dataleser-objektet som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.TextReader>klassen.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: Call this method to load serialized data into the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden for å laste inn serialiserte dataene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: When a load operation occurs, by default the serializable properties are first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved.
trans-unit.target: Når det oppstår en innlastingen, som standard tilbakestilles serialiserbare egenskaper først til standardverdiene før de er satt til de faste verdiene, hvis lagret.

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre dette problemet ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Som standard alle serialiserte diagrammet egenskaper blir lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties, a specific set of properties can be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper for et bestemt sett med egenskaper kan lastes inn.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use this definition, note that the format, which is set by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A> property, must be XML.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker denne definisjonen, Legg merke til at format, noe som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>egenskapen må være XML.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control is used to persist state, this method can be used to load the serialized data that is posted by the client back to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll brukes til å beholde tilstand, denne metoden kan brukes til å laste inn den serialiserte dataene som er lagt inn av klienten tilbake til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reader, such as <xref:System.IO.StringReader>, that is derived from the abstract <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class.
trans-unit.target: Leser, for eksempel <xref:System.IO.StringReader>som er avledet fra abstrakt <xref:System.IO.TextReader>klasse.</xref:System.IO.TextReader> </xref:System.IO.StringReader>

trans-unit.source: Loads serialized data saved to disk into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Laster serialisert data som er lagret på disken til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to load serialized data into the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden for å laste inn serialiserte dataene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: When a load operation occurs, serializable properties are, by default, first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved.
trans-unit.target: Når det oppstår en innlastingen, serialiserbare egenskaper, som standard først tilbakestilles til standardverdiene før de er satt til de faste verdiene, hvis lagret.

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre dette problemet ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Som standard alle serialiserte diagrammet egenskaper blir lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: To load specific serialized properties, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> , <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties before loading the data.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn bestemte serialiserte egenskaper, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper før du laster inn dataene.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that when data is saved using a `Save` method, only those properties that have non-default values are actually serialized.
trans-unit.target: Merk at når dataene er lagret som bruker en `Save` metode, bare egenskaper som har ikke standard verdier er faktisk serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path of the file used to store the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Relativ eller absolutt bane for filen som brukes til å lagre de serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: If a relative path is specified, the path will be relative to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en relativ bane er angitt, blir banen relative til gjeldende mappe.

trans-unit.source: Loads serialized data into the control from an object derived from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class.
trans-unit.target: Laster serialisert data i kontrollen fra et objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>klassen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Call this method to load serialized data into the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden for å laste inn serialiserte dataene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: When a load operation occurs, by default serializable properties are first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved.
trans-unit.target: Når det oppstår en innlastingen, som standard tilbakestilles serialiserbare egenskaper først til standardverdiene før de er satt til de faste verdiene, hvis lagret.

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre dette problemet ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Som standard alle serialiserte diagrammet egenskaper blir lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties, a specific set of properties can be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper for et bestemt sett med egenskaper kan lastes inn.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use this definition, the format must be XML; it can be changed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker denne definisjonen, må formatet være XML. Det kan endres med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you work with XML format text files, for simplicity use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Load%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Når du arbeider med XML tekstfiler for enkelt Bruk format den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Load%2A>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object from which to read the persisted data.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som kan lese den faste data.

trans-unit.source: The object is derived from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class, and can be a .NET Framework object or a user-defined object.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som er avledet av den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>klasse, og kan være et .NET Framework-objekt eller en brukerdefinert objekt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the chart properties that will not be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapene for diagram som ikke kan serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> expression that represents the chart properties that will not be serialized.
trans-unit.target: En kommadelt <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> uttrykk som representerer diagrammet egenskapene som ikke kan serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: The syntax is "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".
trans-unit.target: Syntaksen er "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".

trans-unit.source: Resets all chart properties marked for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller alle egenskaper som er merket for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method resets all chart properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller alle egenskaper for diagram til standardverdiene som standard.

trans-unit.source: To limit the chart properties that are reset to their defaults, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil begrense diagrammet egenskapene som skal tilbakestilles til standardverdiene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is also called automatically when a `Load` method is used and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne metoden kalles også automatisk når en `Load` metoden brukes og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsResetWhenLoading%2A>

trans-unit.source: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to an object that derives from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class.
trans-unit.target: Og lagrer diagramdata med ikke-standard verdiene til et objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.Stream>klassen.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vil alle egenskaper for diagram med ikke-standard verdier, som inneholder datapunkter, serialiseres når denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: To control chart characteristics to be serialized, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskaper for diagrammet serialiseres, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this method is used to save appearance properties as a template, make sure that the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer> object is first set to `true` before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden brukes til å lagre egenskaper for utseende som en mal, må du kontrollere at det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer>objektet først er satt til `true` før du kaller opp denne metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Serialization of a chart as a template occurs differently from non-template serialization; template serialization concentrates on Appearance properties.
trans-unit.target: Serialisering av et diagram som en mal på en annen måte skjer etter ikke malen serialisering; malen serialisering tar for seg utseendet egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: When a template is serialized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.LoadTemplate%2A> method can be used to load the template, to provide the Appearance properties for a chart.
trans-unit.target: Når en mal er serialisert, den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.LoadTemplate%2A>metoden kan brukes til å laste inn malen som inneholder egenskapene utseendet for et diagram.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.LoadTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.
trans-unit.target: Maler som kan brukes til å simulere egendefinerte palettene.

trans-unit.source: An object derived from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class, such as <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>, that is used to save chart properties.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er avledet fra den <xref:System.IO.Stream>class, for eksempel <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>, som brukes til å lagre egenskaper for diagram.</xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given object that is derived from the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer diagramdata og egenskaper med ikke-standardverdier til det angitte objektet som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>klassen.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vil alle egenskaper for diagram med ikke-standard verdier, som inneholder datapunkter, serialiseres når denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: To control which chart characteristics are serialized, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som diagrammet er serialisert, styre bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker denne definisjonen, må formatet være XML. formatet kan angis med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control is used to persist state, this method can be used to save the serialized data to an object derived from <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, which is then used to write the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A>property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll brukes til å beholde tilstand, denne metoden kan brukes til å lagre de serialiserte dataene i et objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, som deretter brukes til å skrive data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> class, for example, <xref:System.IO.StringWriter>, that is used to save chart properties.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>class, for eksempel <xref:System.IO.StringWriter>, som brukes til å lagre egenskaper for diagram.</xref:System.IO.StringWriter> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given file.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer diagramdata og egenskaper med ikke-standard verdier til den angitte filen.

trans-unit.source: By default all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vil alle egenskaper for diagram med ikke-standard verdier, som inneholder datapunkter, serialiseres når denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: To control chart characteristics to be serialized use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer diagrammet egenskaper for å være serialisert bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default data is saved in an XML format.
trans-unit.target: Som standard lagres i et XML-format.

trans-unit.source: To save the data in a binary format, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil lagre dataene i et binært format, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that Write permissions must be enabled for the directory in which the file is stored.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at skrivetillatelse må være aktivert for katalogen der filen er lagret.

trans-unit.source: By default, this is the Bin folder of the application.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er mappen posisjon for applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: If this method is being used to save Appearance properties as a template, make sure that the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A> property is first set to `true` before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden brukes til å lagre egenskaper for utseende som en mal, må du kontrollere at det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A>først er satt til `true` før du kaller opp denne metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Serialization of a chart as a template proceeds differently from non-template serialization, primarily because template serialization concentrates on Appearance properties.
trans-unit.target: Serialisering av et diagram som en mal fortsetter forskjellig fra ikke-template serialisering først og fremst fordi malen serialisering tar på utseendet egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: When a template is serialized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.LoadTemplate%2A> method can be used to load the template, to provide the Appearance properties for a chart.
trans-unit.target: Når en mal er serialisert, den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.LoadTemplate%2A>metoden kan brukes til å laste inn malen som inneholder egenskapene utseendet for et diagram.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.LoadTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.
trans-unit.target: Maler som kan brukes til å simulere egendefinerte palettene.

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path of the file used to store the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Relativ eller absolutt bane for filen som brukes til å lagre de serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Note that if a relative path is specified, the path will be relative to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hvis en relativ bane er angitt, blir banen relative til gjeldende mappe.

trans-unit.source: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given object that is derived from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer diagramdata og egenskaper med ikke-standardverdier til det angitte objektet som er avledet fra <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>klassen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vil alle egenskaper for diagram med ikke-standard verdier, som inneholder datapunkter, serialiseres når denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: To control which chart characteristics are serialized, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som diagrammet er serialisert, styre bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.SerializableContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be changed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker denne definisjonen, må formatet være XML. formatet kan endres med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you work with XML format text files, for simplicity use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Save%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Når du arbeider med XML tekstfiler for enkelt Bruk format den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Save%2A>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> used to save <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> properties.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>brukes til å lagre <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> egenskaper.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the chart properties that can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapene for diagram som kan serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: By default all chart properties will be serialized when the `Save` and `Load` methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Som standard alle egenskaper som diagrammet skal serialiseres når den `Save` og `Load` kalles metoder.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> property to limit chart characteristics to be serialized, along with the SerializableContent and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>til å begrense diagrammet egenskaper serialiseres, sammen med SerializableContent og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SerializableContent property determines which chart characteristics will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SerializableContent bestemmer egenskaper som diagrammet skal serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: Wildcards can be used in the string expression, in the same manner as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Jokertegn kan brukes i strengeuttrykk, på samme måte som den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to serialize all chart `BackColor` properties, set this property to "*.BackColor". If <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> and/or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> child properties are specified, then the names of all <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects must be also specified to enable the persisted data to be applied to existing <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects; that is, you must specify "Series.Name" and "ChartArea.Name" expressions. See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. Similarly, if multiple chart areas are being used, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> property of all plotted <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> must also be saved. Sometimes, a property can be set to be both serialized and not serialized, which is common when wildcards are used. The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> expression has a lower priority when compared to the SerializableContent expression. However, note that less weight is given to string expressions that use wildcards. For example, if the SerializableContent property is set to "*.BackColor" and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>, all B`ackColor` properties except for <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å serialisere alle diagram `BackColor` egenskaper Sett denne egenskapen til "*. Bakgrunnsfarge". Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>og/eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>underordnede ikke er angitt egenskaper, deretter navnene på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>klokkeslettobjekter må angis også aktivere faste data som skal brukes på eksisterende <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objekter; det vil si du må angi "Series.Name" og "ChartArea.Name" uttrykk.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> Se eksempelkode under et eksempel på denne prosedyren. På samme måte, hvis flere diagramområder brukes, den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A>for alle tegnes <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>må også lagres.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> En egenskap kan eventuelt angis både serialisert og ikke serialisert som er felles ved bruk av jokertegn. Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>uttrykket har en lavere prioritet sammenlignet med SerializableContent-uttrykket.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A> Vær oppmerksom på at mindre vekt er angitt til strenguttrykk med jokertegn. For eksempel hvis egenskapen SerializableContent er satt til "*. Bakgrunnsfarge"og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>, alle B`ackColor` egenskaper bortsett fra for <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objekter skal serialiseres.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.NonSerializableContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> property, the SerializableContent property will be set internally.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>egenskapen SerializableContent-egenskapen satt internt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> property is already set but another property needs to be serialized, make sure to concatenate the SerializableContent property when specifying that extra property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>egenskapen er allerede angitt, men en annen egenskap må serialiseres, kontroller at til å koble sammen egenskapen SerializableContent når du angir ekstra egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the sample code below for an example of this procedure.
trans-unit.target: Se eksempelkode under et eksempel på denne prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: This property affects all save, load and reset operations.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker alle lagre laste inn og tilbakestille operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> expression that represents the chart properties to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: En kommadelt <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> uttrykk som representerer egenskapene diagrammet serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: The syntax is "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".
trans-unit.target: Syntaksen er "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".
